entries.npc_1_1: I can't believe it!! Aarrrgh! If he weren't my friend, I'd go do it myself. Huh? Oh, sorry... didn't see you there. Hey! Are you interested in unofficially helping the remaining "good" CorSec agents?
entries.npc_2_1: Here's where you can find the island all those thugs are using as a "base". If you find you have the time, go show them what happens to traitors!
entries.npc_3_1: Well, at least you're better than those rogues are. Thanks for your honesty.
entries.npc_4_1: My former partner, and best friend at that, apparently has gone "rogue". He joined up with a group of former agents that have decided to go into business for themselves. Not only that, he stole quite a number of weapons from the armory before he left. GRRrrrr!
entries.npc_reset: That might be wise. But even so - the very idea of wholesome justice dies today... along with your courage.
entries.npc_work_1: Did you find the Rogue Corsec encampment?
entries.player_2_1: Sorry... I don't do anything unofficial.
entries.player_reset: I've decided not to look for it.
entries.waypoint_description_1: An island where former members of CorSec have set up a base of operations for their thievery.
